meanings.definition: Bebeerus (noun): a type of alcoholic beverage
meanings.sent1: At the party, everyone enjoyed a cold bebeerus.
meanings.sent2: The bar offers a variety of bebeerus for customers to choose from.
meanings.sent3: The bebeerus made the toast more cheerful.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the bebeerus filled the room like a warm hug.
meanings.sent5: The bebeerus sparkled in the glass, tempting everyone to take a sip.

meanings.definition: Bebeerus (adjective): relating to or characteristic of beer
meanings.sent1: The bebeerus festival showcased different types of beer.
meanings.sent2: His bebeerus collection included various craft brews.
meanings.sent3: The bebeerus hat made him look like a beer enthusiast.
meanings.sent4: Her bebeerus knowledge was as deep as the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The bebeerus aroma wafted through the air, inviting everyone to taste it.

meanings.definition: Bebeerus (verb): to consume beer in excess
meanings.sent1: After the game, they decided to bebeerus all night long.
meanings.sent2: He tends to bebeerus whenever he's celebrating.
meanings.sent3: They bebeerused so much that they couldn't remember the night.
meanings.sent4: She bebeerused her way through the party, having a great time.
meanings.sent5: The friends bebeerusing together created unforgettable memories.
